General.Description: Aeternity or AE is a new blockchain technology revolution with the purpose to deliver unmatched efficiency, transparent governance and global scalability. Known for efficient blockchain platform, this platform can solve high bandwidth transaction, smart contracts, etc. The AE also brings many innovative applications in a number of fields for users such as Research & Academia, Partnerships, Meetups and Conferences, etc.
General.Features: State-of-the-art cryptographic datastructures and unparalleled decentralization provide efficiency and eliminate every single-point-of-failure. Moreover, the Low cost,  innovative State Channels. Smart contracts exist only inside off chain state channels. Furthermore, Decentralized Oracles
General.Technology: AE helps any problems easily distributed, fault-tolerant, soft real-time because the token has been written in Erlang. Besides, the consensus succeed through a novel hybrid PoW and PoS algorithm.
